Wife and I went here on Honeymoon.  Best croquettes ever!!!  Incredible location on beach, great atmosphere, superiour service!  It was so good we went back the next night!!!!  The bartender remembered us and got us a good table even though they were completely booked.  Also, the seafood paella is incredible.  Specialty of the house.  You get an entire half lobster served straight up in the PAN over the rice goodness.GO HERE WHEN IN BARCELONA!
